title: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two instances of the Revert option in the menu.
OB: The Revert option appears twice in the popup menu.
EB: The Revert option should only appear once and should be disabled. To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the editor. 2) Make changes to the document. 3) Popup the menu.
SR: Fix the issue causing the Revert option to appear twice in the popup menu and ensure it is disabled when it should be.
